div.p: Collection of epithelial cells for primary culture. Fish were removed from home tanks and place in ∼1500 mL of water containing 400 uL of oil of cloves solution ( Fig. 1A, B). After a light plane of anethesia was induced, epithelial cells were removed from the fish with a clean scalpel ( Fig. 1C) and placed into a 15 mL polypropelene vial containing supplemented PBS ( Fig. 1D, E).
